Body.Build: Glass front, aluminum frame or titanium frame, glass back
Body.SIM: Nano-SIM and eSIM or Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)
Body.info: IP68 dust/water resistant (up to 1.5m for 30 min)

Display.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 68B colors, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, 3000 nits (peak)

Platform.CPU: Octa-core (1x3.3 GHz Cortex-X4 & 3x3.2 GHz Cortex-A720 & 2x3.0 GHz Cortex-A720 & 2x2.3 GHz Cortex-A520)

Main Camera.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.4-f/4.0, 23mm (wide), 1/1.31", 1.2µm, dual pixel PDAF, Laser AF, OIS
50 MP, f/2.0, 75mm (telephoto), PDAF (10cm - ∞), OIS, 3.2x optical zoom
50 MP, f/2.2, 14mm, 115˚ (ultrawide), AF
Main Camera.Features: Leica lens, Dual-LED dual-tone flash, HDR, panorama

Comms.Bluetooth: 5.4, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive
Comms.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (G1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L5)

Features.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, proximity, gyro, compass, barometer, color spectrum

Battery.Charging:
120W wired, PD3.0, QC4, 100% in 18 min (advertised)
50W wireless, 100% in 40 min (advertised)
10W reverse wireless
